AvatarArchetype.Description: A disciplined warrior bound by bushido, the way of the warrior. Masters of the katana and defenders of their lord's honor, samurai are the backbone of any army.
Warrior monks who have forsaken peaceful meditation for righteous fury. Armed with naginata and burning faith, sohei are fearsome berserkers who channel divine wrath.
Shadow operatives trained in the arts of espionage, sabotage, and assassination. Ninja clans sell their services to the highest bidder, striking from darkness.
Mountain hunters who live in harmony with nature. Expert trackers and archers, matagi know the secrets of the wilderness and commune with animal spirits.
Practitioners of onmyodo, the way of yin and yang. These court magicians divine the future, ward against evil, and command the five elements through ancient rituals.
Ascetic mountain hermits who have unlocked forbidden knowledge through extreme training. Their mastery of esoteric Buddhism grants power over reality itself.
Shinto priests who serve the kami and maintain the sacred shrines. Through prayer and purification rituals, they channel divine blessings and banish evil spirits.
Blind traveling musicians who carry the tales of fallen warriors. Their haunting melodies can inspire allies, curse enemies, and commune with the spirits of the dead.
Those born with the ability to bind and command spirits. Whether fox spirits, oni, or ancestral ghosts, these summoners forge pacts with supernatural entities.
